I love the way the photographer is oblivious to the machinery at the far left.
What ever they are sitting on looks so heavy to be quite an effort to shift. Road block perhaps?

comment._content: GoogleMapsStreetView - goo.gl/maps/cQjNS . There's an odd optical illusion - the closer you get to the arch, the lower it seems in relation to the two pylons.
